main event: Mr. and Mrs. James W. Johnson reported seeing a bright, round, white object moving rapidly across the sky.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 30 seconds,The object was bright and round,Weather conditions were clear with stars visible,The investigation was conducted by Capt. Byers (USAF),The object was ultimately classified as unidentified.
sighted object: bright, round, white object in the sky
witness description: Mr. and Mrs. James W. Johnson
